actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Library Services and Construction Act to allow the States to reduce the amount expended for State institutional library services.

summary.text: Amends the Library Services and Construction Act to revise the limitation on reduction of funds formula that a State must include in its application for Federal assistance for library services for the handicapped, State institutions, and other library services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Library Services and Construction Act to allow the States to reduce the amount expended for State institutional library services.
